skills.skill: Message Queues, Brokers, Data Streaming (e.g., Apache Kafka, NATS)
Frontend Website Development (e.g., HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React)
Telematics Systems and Data Visualization Technologies

duties_responsibilities.duty: Staff management & development, supervising a team of approximately 15-20 people.
Staff planning, including adjusting to shifting priorities and solving problems quickly.
Mentoring staff to maintain high levels of performance and positive morale.
Collaborating with internal functional and project managers, and customers in forming strategies to improve performance.
Acting as scrum of scrums master to manage work streams of multiple sprint teams.
Managing release plan and road map for agile development.
Leading scrum team as scrum master for multiple projects.
Serving as Subject Matter Expert (SME) on Agile development methods and processes.
Managing software development processes using GitHub, Atlassian Jira and Confluence, Sonar Cloud.
Designing, developing, and managing applications using both relational and non-relational databases.
Understanding and leveraging common software development architectural styles and patterns (SOA, Microservices, etc.).
Applying quality techniques and practices (automated unit testing, Test Driven Design/Development, continuous integration).
Developing real-time, embedded software.
Analyzing or developing ITS and/or control systems.
Developing architecture and designing complex systems.
Working on Agile projects and with Agile toolsets, such as JIRA and Confluence.
Developing code with Unity/HTC Vive.
Flourishing within a dynamic, fun team environment as well as independently.
Working with Git, Docker, and continuous integration/continuous deployment.
Obtaining and maintaining a Public Trust security clearance.

education_certification.credential: B.S. in computer science, engineering, or other science disciplines with 8+ years of prior relevant experience, or Master's degree with 6+ years of prior relevant experience.
